message: Comprehensive schizophrenia spectrum extraction complete. Found 5 disorders with precise diagnostic criteria, 7 clinical case examples, and clear temporal/functional distinctions. Key insight: Duration is primary differentiator (1 day→<1 month→1-6 months→≥6 months), while functioning level separates delusional disorder (intact) from others (impaired).

Created question themes document with 9 thematic categories for 15+ questions. Includes: difficulty distribution (easy/medium/hard/tricky), ADHD-friendly explanation templates, concrete examples for each theme, and recommended question mix. Ready for implementation phase.
